Html:
Hello, there are some premade talents in the list of mage's talents. And i would like to add some more, how would i go about doing this?

I am guessing i need to download the source code and go from there somehow.
You would need to change the source yes. Or you can post them here and I can add them in for next release if they really fill some gap.

You probably would prefer i just did it lol. Why because its just a bunch of both main stream raiding, pvp, instance builds + random builds just to see what it can do. Anyway where can i get the source files needed to edit and add the builds? (if you dont want/feel/or care to add them) Thanks for the wonderfull program by the way.
Here are the list below: -- some of these may be same as already implented builds but i am unsure since i cant export the warcraft link to compare, also some builds are similar to one another with two or three talents moved around --
